autoeat.config.title: AutoEat Configuration
autoeat.config.hungerThreshold.tooltip: Start eating when hunger drops below this level
autoeat.config.eatUntilFull.tooltip: Continue eating until hunger bar is completely full
autoeat.config.prioritizeBetterFood.tool: Choose food with better saturation values
autoeat.config.useOffhand.tooltip: Check offhand for food before main inventory
autoeat.config.pauseCooldown.tooltip: Wait time after damage before eating again
